entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ASP.NET Core Blazor Authorization Roles do not allow non-word characters #53398
  • Perf regression: caching, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #53394
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #53393
  • Kestrel: callbacks for HTTP2 events(stream open, stream close, stream error, etc) #53387
  • The POST request does not specify which form is being submitted. #53382
  • Modify the Blazor Web App template #53381
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Permission Based Authorization In Blazor .Net 8 #53378
  • Kestrel: Ability to capture HTTP2 errors #53377
  • Blazor [.NET 6] DotNetStreamReference throws exception when arrayBuffer is not read in javascript with using keyword. #53376
  • Make `FormMappingValidator` public #53374
  • Expose the string prefix from Editor<T> so that other components can consume it (title updated to reflect context) #53373
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Error : Cannot read properties of null (reading 'removeChild')) #53372
  • Exception raised from `Factory.CreateClient()` when type provided to `WebApplicationFactory<TEntryPoint>` is a subclass of `Program` #53370
  • Updated blazor server dotnet 7 to 8. builder.Services.AddCascadingAuthenticationState(); doesn't call GetAuthenticationStateAsync() after login. Old way <CascadingAuthenticationState> component does, but now causes UI flicker. #53369

Closed

  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, mapaction, plainTextEmptyFilter #53276
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #53353
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, updates #53375
  • Buttons must have discernible text #52141
    8.0.x
  • When token expires the authenticationservice.js gets a new token but not with all of the same scopes as the original request #53296
  • HTTP OTEL metrics: use `error.type` instead of `exception.type` attribute #51029
  • what's different between use and not use await base.OnAfterRenderAsync #53357
  • Provide the ability to build static sites like Svelte, Hugo, or Gatsby #53365
  • Blazor SSR using Iframe is not working #53205
  • Loading static assets from wwwroot folder returns 404 not found in Blazor8 #53204
  • .NET 6/7 migration to .NET 8 with Docker container #53327

PullRequests

Created

  • Better implementation of EventCallback.Equals #53395
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Enable websocket compression for Blazor Server and Interactive Server components in Blazor web #53389
    area-blazor
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Install scripts update validation PR #53371
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [main] Add title to column options. Fixes #52141 #53304
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [main] Stop duplicating history with streaming-enhanced-form PRG. Fixes #51674 #53303
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Avoid fetching new page content when only the hash changes #53341
    area-blazor
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty and ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #52897
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
